rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming space aligned with the main entrance; designed for natural ventilation and adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring an unobstructed entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with access to the garden and balcony; designed for communal activities, ensuring a balanced flow of energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; positioned for optimal natural light and view towards the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen area with modern amenities; placed in a manner that avoids direct alignment with the entrance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Spacious Balcony
rooms.description: Primary bedroom on the ground floor; features a large balcony offering garden views and natural light.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment space integrated with audio-visual systems; designed to be acoustically optimized and separated from the living area.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Designated entrance aligning with Vastu principles; provides direct access to the garden.

openings.name: Garden Access
openings.description: Open passage leading from the living area to the large garden, ensuring natural ventilation and light.

openings.name: Balcony Access for Master Bedroom
openings.description: Direct access from the master bedroom to its spacious balcony.
